Tutorials.Item: Plane Finding

Bodylogical AR requires physical space to function. Move your device around a flat surface to let the camera scan for space. The scanned space will be highlighted in yellow. You can also place a Bodylogical logo on the surface to anchor the stage.
Confirm Plane

Bodylogical AR requires physical space to function. Move your device around a flat surface to let the camera scan for space. The scanned space will be highlighted in yellow. You can also place a Bodylogical logo on the surface to anchor the stage. When you have found an ideal surface, double tap the screen to place your stage.
Confirm Stage
Bodylogical AR has identified an anchor image. Move your image around and spin it to position your stage, and double tap the screen to fix its position.
Placing Stage
Move your device to adjust the position of the stage. Double tap to confirm its position.
Basic Information
Click on the input fields to enter your avatar's information. Click "Change Unit" to switch between metric and Imperial units. When you are done, click "Confirm" to submit.
Health Data
Click on the four icons to inspect the avatar's baseline health data.
Visualizations
After checking the lifestyle, click on the icon to begin the visualization and walk into the future of the avatar.
Activity
You will now see three variants of the same avatar, running on the street. Click the Play/Pause button to start the timing progress.
Progressing Time
Watch how the avatars slow down as they grow older. Click "Play/Pause" again to pause the progress.
You can also drag the handle of the progress bar to jump to a specific time. Click the "Stop" button to go back to the present.
Now, try adjusting the lifestyle options on the panel and see how this would change the avatar's future health.
When you are done exploring, click the icons next to the avatars to examine what caused these changes.
Prius

Here, some internal organs of the avatar are shown. Check their scores and statuses to learn how they affect the avatar's ability to run. When you are done exploring, click the icon beside each avatar to learn the details.
Internals
Each block represents an organ or a system. Watch how the biometrics are connected together and the data flow across different blocks.
Stats
The path is colored to show the health status of the avatar across the years. Additionally, the lifestyle of the three "interventions" are available. Click on the icons to show them.
